name: Game Over
summary: Homage is paid to five classic arcade games. Enjoy Centipede, Frogger, Asteroids, Space Invaders, and Pac-Man games. All are aimed at evoking nostalgia for the intense arcade experience that spawned the billion dollar industry in the late 70s and early 80s.
info:
• 中文名: 游戏结束
  • 上映年度: 2006
  • 片长: 2min
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 无对白
  • 导演: PES
  • 编剧: PES
